item.title: Digital Image Processing - Ch1 Introduction
item.description: Ch1 Introduction History of DIP Applications Fundamental steps in DIP Code im_input = imread('./Pics/Ch01/Lena.jpg'); figure, imshow(im_input), title('original color image'); im_gray = rgb2gray(im_input); figure, imshow(im_gray), title('original color image'); imwrite(im_gray,'gray.jpg'); imfinfo('./Pics/Ch01/Lena.jpg') Output ans = Filename: '/Users/jinwang/Desktop/Academy/大三上/Digital_Image_Processing/matlab/Pics/Ch01/Lena.jpg' FileModDate: '27-Jun-2013 21:31:06' FileSize: 91814 Format: 'jpg' FormatVersion: '' Width: 512 Height: 512 BitDepth: 24 ColorType: 'truecolor' FormatSignature: '' NumberOfSamples: 3 CodingMethod: 'Huffman' CodingProcess: 'Sequential' Comment: {'Handmade Software, Inc. Image Alchemy v1.9↵'}
